review_data.title: Cozy Pub with Great Selection of Craft Beers and Scotches
review_data.content: We stopped by to try some local beers. Our waiter was very welcoming, kind and helpful. He allowed us to taste the various beers they had on tap before we made our choices. They offer a great selection of craft beers and scotches. It was...More

review_data.title: Nice cozy bar
review_data.content: Cozy bar/pub in a corner off the busy main Niederdorf street. Beer was good. The bartenders were friendly and helpful with giving advice on my covid certificate. I came here twice in my 4 days in Zurich.

review_data.title: Lieu chic mais cher

review_data.title: Chic, low-key spot
review_data.content: We popped in for a light meal and some wine and sat at the bar in this small place. Bartender was attentive and patient with our language reluctance, and the small plates were tasty. Locals were the rule.

Nowadays when there is much focus on customer service and the possibility to leave online reviews, it’s increasingly important that the service industry deliver good service. review_data.title: Classy interior

review_data.title: Great location for a happy hour drink and chill...
review_data.content: Stopped by for a happy hour beer...friendly, happy staff helped us with our beer/wine choice, and we chilled at outside table...people-watching was great on this little corner...we had just had late lunch, so didn't try food, but several tables had tapas...looked good!

review_data.title: Always good for a after work beer
review_data.content: Nice and cosy place. Not like the other bars in the area, which are often dark and smelly. Good beer. Good music (and not too loud).

review_data.title: with tapas and belgian beer
review_data.content: Nothing special in this bar except that you can get some small tapas and after work aperitivo. There is also some belgian beer which you can't find in every bar in zurich :)

review_data.title: Excellent bar
review_data.content: We visit this bar regularly. Service is excellent and the beer is cold. Would recommend to anyone on a Friday night.

review_data.title: Not anymore as once was
review_data.content: Corazon was a little nice place to visit with friends, with a good atmosphere. Unfortunately this changed, very slow and grumpy service,10% cocktail 90% ice cubes for an unreasonable amount of money. no way this place will see me again.

review_data.title: Decent lounge type bar
